00015         template <typename genType> 
00016         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType clamp
00017         (
00018                 genType const & Texcoord
00019         )
00020         {
00021                 return glm::clamp(Texcoord, genType(0), genType(1));
00022         }
00023 
00024         template <typename T, precision P> 
00025         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<T, P> clamp
00026         (
00027                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Texcoord
00028         )
00029         {
00030                 detail::tvec2<T, P> Result;
00031                 for(typename detail::tvec2<T, P>::size_type i = 0; i < detail::tvec2<T, P>::value_size(); ++i)
00032                         Result[i] = clamp(Texcoord[i]);
00033                 return Result;
00034         }
00035

00041         {
00042                 detail::tvec3<T, P> Result;

00061         // repeat
00062 
00063         template <typename genType> 
00064         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType repeat
00065         (
00066                 genType const & Texcoord
00067         )
00068         {
00069                 return glm::fract(Texcoord);
00070         }

00109         // mirrorRepeat
00110 
00111         template <typename genType, precision P> 
00112         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType mirrorRepeat
00113         (
00114                 genType const & Texcoord
00115         )
00116         {
00117                 genType const Clamp = genType(int(glm::floor(Texcoord)) % 2);
00118                 genType const Floor = glm::floor(Texcoord);
00119                 genType const Rest = Texcoord - Floor;
00120                 genType const Mirror = Clamp + Rest;
00121 
00122                 genType Out;
00123                 if(Mirror >= genType(1))
00124                         Out = genType(1) - Rest;
00125                 else
00126                         Out = Rest;
00127                 return Out;
00128         }
00129 
00130         template <typename T, precision P> 
00131         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<T, P> mirrorRepeat
00132         (
00133                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Texcoord
00134         )
00135         {
00136                 detail::tvec2<T, P> Result;
00137                 for(typename detail::tvec2<T, P>::size_type i = 0; i < detail::tvec2<T, P>::value_size(); ++i)
00138                         Result[i] = mirrorRepeat(Texcoord[i]);
00139                 return Result;
00140         }
00141
